summary: Generates URLs for blog submission by iterating through the "quarto_blog/myblog/posts" directory and printing the base URL with each file path.

details.comment: Generates URLs for blog submission by iterating through the "quarto_blog/myblog/posts" directory and printing the base URL with each file path.
details.content:
base_url = "https://james4ever0.github.io/blog_quarto"
import os
for path in os.listdir("quarto_blog/myblog/posts"):
    print(f"{base_url}/posts/{path}/")
